entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
